stories.text:
Lambda | Full-Time | Software Engineers | Remote US, Canada | https://lambdalabs.com/ We are looking for talented software engineers to join our team. We're currently hiring Engineering Managers, Frontend, Fullstack, backend and system engineers. Lambda is a fast growing startup providing deep learning hardware, software, and cloud services to the world's leading companies and research institutions. Lambda’s mission is to create a world where access to computation is as effortless and ubiquitous as electricity. Learn more about our team and open roles here: https://lambdalabs.com/careers

If you are interested, you can reach me at austin(at)lambdal.com (mention HN in the subject)
